reviewText:
I concur with the "blah" review 100%.  As far as bad camera and editing work from Penthouse Videos go, this is one of the worst I've seen.  Annoying jump cuts and camera that never stays still until you lose your mind with frustration.  The fully explicit frontal nudity is extremely brief... therefore pretty much useless.

This 1999 release could have been so good - the editing occasionally leaves in just enough to see what you are missing, which includes a lot of shots where the girl is clearly preparing for a two-handed pink spread only for it to fade out to some other shot before we see anything good.  Same goes for all the girl-girl scenes.  The camera buzzes around like an irritating little bee, never really giving any good lingering shots of anything... and then the editing comes in and shortens those cuts even more and then flashes between cuts incessantly until you want to scream.

Such a pity, because the women here are pretty hot and some of them seem to want to show us what we want to see.  But there is so much interference from the production - resulting in an utter FAIL which is neither erotic nor stimulating.
Penthouse ~ Pet of the Year & Friends is pretty boring low rent stuff. penthouse is known for being racier

The DVD is now something to cherish. Paige Summers was found dead today in my hometown of Morganton, NC. Having met her on several occassions, she is bound to be missed not only by her fans but by the people of the small town we all shared. Apparantly it was a drug overdose. What a shame that drugs have snuffed out one more beautiful life.

It is really a shame with a beautiful woman like Nikie St. Gilles from Holland,how could this DVD be so bad you ask. Well for one she splits screen time with 3 other models,one only being good(Alexus Winston)and Alexus only gets one scene anyways(TOTAL WASTE,ALEXUS IS HOTTER THAN NIKIE). Also Nikie talks which is nice but she spends more time talking than posing. Finally this is really tame almost as tame as playboy unfortunately,not showing any erotica.
This film is very erotic, but nowhere as good as what Pet of the Year and Friends with Paige Summers is. This film features plenty of action, with the usual Penthouse class. . .

What can I say? The four girls are beautiful and the scenes are pretty hot. There are solo scenes, two-girl scenes, and there is one three in a bath scene at the end. The only problem I had with this was the quick  cutting, usually only one or two seconds before a cut. Still, with Jessica  James looking as fantastic as she does in this, I had no complaints.
